content: Crazy idea: create a GDCC LinkedIn page and add Dataverse as a product. Share news and developments there, too. Related to what Katherine Skinner said at the DCM 2025 GDCC + sustainability roundtable. Ping @Dieuwertje Bloemen @Pedro Principe @Philipp Conzett

I like this a lot. It seems LinkedIn is the most used "social media" for RDM? We've been using it for RSpace, mostly cross-posting release notes or attendance at events. It's good because people could then tag GDCC in their posts!
That would be great, I had the same thought on Sunday while browsing LinkedIn!
Would this be considered part of a larger social media strategy?

Philip Durbin said:

Would this be considered part of a larger social media strategy?

It should indeed, as mentioned by Oliver it would be part of the global sustainability roadmap for the GDCC, but it would be nice to have it early so we can share the progress of said roadmap :)
Maybe we should start another topic about social media in general.
